name: Dual Bus Simulator
description:
Experience the thrill of being a bus driver in "Dual Bus Simulator."

Take on the role of a skilled driver operating a unique dual bus, providing public transportation services throughout the bustling city and beyond.

Your mission is to reach the station within the limited time, pick up passengers, and transport them to their destinations. Can you handle the challenges of time management and ensure a smooth and efficient commute for your passengers?

Get ready to master the art of dual bus transportation and become a driving force in the city's public transit system!

Game Features :
- 2 Game Modes ( City and Country)
- 20 levels
- Drive along diverse routes, including city streets and scenic roads
